querystring.select: SELECT L.LEAD_NO AS LeadNo, L.LEAD_ID AS LeadId, CL.LEAD_COPY_ID AS LeadCopyId, L.ORI_OFFICE_CODE AS OriOfficeCode, L.ORDER_NO AS OrderNo, RM.DESCR AS MrLeadSourceCode, L.CMO_USERNAME AS CmoUsername, L.SURVEYOR_USERNAME AS SurveyorUsername, L.TELE_MARKETING_USERNAME AS TeleMarketingUsername, RO.OFFICE_NAME AS OfficeName, V.VENDOR_NAME AS AgencyName, L.LOB_CODE AS LobCode, LC.CUST_NAME AS CustName
querystring.from: FROM dbo.LEAD L WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN dbo.V_REF_OFFICE RO WITH(NOLOCK) ON L.ORI_OFFICE_CODE = RO.OFFICE_CODE LEFT JOIN V_VENDOR V ON V.VENDOR_CODE = L.AGENCY_CODE AND V.MR_VENDOR_CATEGORY_CODE = 'AGENCY_COMPANY'  LEFT JOIN dbo.LEAD CL WITH(NOLOCK) ON CL.LEAD_ID = L.LEAD_COPY_ID LEFT JOIN [V_REF_MASTER] RM ON RM.MASTER_CODE = L.MR_LEAD_SOURCE_CODE AND RM.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE = 'LEAD_SOURCE' LEFT JOIN dbo.LEAD_CUST LC WITH(NOLOCK) ON L.LEAD_ID = LC.LEAD_ID
